links.*: Guide to the Names in The Lord of the Rings
The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion

wikitext.*:
The '''Puddifoots''' were a family of [[Hobbits]]. They were to be found in [[Stock]] of the [[Marish]]. Unlike most Hobbits, who dwelled in [[hobbit-hole]]s, and like most folk of the Marish, the Puddifoots were house-dwellers.<ref>{{FR|Mushrooms}}</ref>
==Etymology==
The name comes from "puddle-foot" and is connected to the soft soil of the [[Marish]].<ref>{{HM|N}}, p. 113</ref>
